choices.answer: When a few people work to improve the wellbeing of society
When we work together to improve wellbeing of society
When high status people decide what is best for society
Reached when everyone does their own thing for themselves

questions.question: What would be the common good of our indigenous people?

choices.answer: Separate them from other communities
Increase their welfare payments
Increase programs and community involvement for indigenous
Leave indigenous people be

questions.question: When was the notion of ‘common good’ originated?

choices.answer: 1000 years ago
2000 years ago
3000 years ago
4000 years ago

questions.question: What would be the common good of washing the dishes as a chore

choices.answer: Make mum do the dishes
Pay your sister to do the dishes
Don’t even worry about the dishes
Organise for everyone in the family to share dishes chore

questions.question: What is the common good in supermarkets for the community?

choices.answer: Employing more people
Self serve checkouts
Increasing employers hour rates
Decreasing the amount of workers on shift.

questions.question: What has Caritas been doing to work on the common good around the world?

choices.answer: Donate footy shoes to indigenous communities
Use donations for the businesses and investors revenue
Throw the money in the bin
Helping out during the solomon earthquakes of 2007

questions.question: How could citizens of Brazil act in the common good for the poor people living in the slums?

choices.answer: Separate the income inequality gap even more
Let the poor people know that their home is small
Help find ways to make the communities better
Make sure citizens avoid the slums as they are dirty

questions.question: How to improve the health of kids and adults across the country?

choices.answer: Provide families with information on making healthy choices
Provide unhealthy foods at kids schools
Advertise unhealthy fast food restaurants on tv
Don’t educate families on healthy food

questions.question: How could we use the common good in our everyday lives?

choices.answer: Ignoring everyone
Doing things that benefit everyone
Thinking about yourself
Doing things that benefit others

questions.question: How would Ms Harmes demonstrate the common good

choices.answer: Keep the Caritas money for herself
Make fun of the less fortunate
Telling students social justice is bad
Encourage students to participate in social justice
